WHO WE ARE?

Your Shield for Safer Business

Tradeshield is a new robust service on Dubai Trade that enables customers to apply and obtain standard insurance policies online.

It has been created to further streamline trade processes, converting manual procedures to faster more convenient electronic transactions. Creating a true one stop shop for all shipping related services.
